scripts.build:pkg: tsc -p tsconfig.pkg.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pkg.json && node scripts/copy-css.js
scripts.reinstall: npm install && npm audit && npm audit fix && npm run lint:fix && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.rebuild: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && next build && next-sitemap && tsc -p tsconfig.pkg.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pkg.json && node scripts/copy-css.js
scripts.github: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)) { $msg='General Adjustments' }; git status; git add -A; git diff --cached --quiet; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { git commit -m \"$msg\" } else { Write-Host 'No changes to commit.' }; git fetch origin; git switch main; git pull --rebase origin main; git push -u origin main;"
scripts.env: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const e=process.env.npm_config_env; if(!e){console.error('Falta parametro --env=<Name> (ej: --env=NIXINX)');process.exit(1);} const s='.env.'+e+'.local'; const d='.env.local'; if(!fs.existsSync(s)){console.error('No existe '+s);process.exit(1);} fs.copyFileSync(s,d); console.log('Using '+s+' -> '+d);"
scripts.release:patch:dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$branch=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if ($branch -ne 'main') { git switch main }; git pull --rebase origin main; npm run build:pkg; npm version patch; git push origin main; git push --tags; npm publish --access=restricted" && npm run dev
scripts.release:patch:start: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$branch=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if ($branch -ne 'main') { git switch main }; git pull --rebase origin main; npm run build:pkg; npm version patch; git push origin main; git push --tags; npm publish --access=restricted" && npm run start
scripts.release:minor:dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$branch=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if ($branch -ne 'main') { git switch main }; git pull --rebase origin main; npm run build:pkg; npm version minor; git push origin main; git push --tags; npm publish --access=restricted" && npm run dev
scripts.release:minor:start: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$branch=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if ($branch -ne 'main') { git switch main }; git pull --rebase origin main; npm run build:pkg; npm version minor; git push origin main; git push --tags; npm publish --access=restricted" && npm run start
scripts.release:major:start: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$branch=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if ($branch -ne 'main') { git switch main }; git pull --rebase origin main; npm run build:pkg; npm version major; git push origin main; git push --tags; npm publish --access=restricted" && npm run dev
scripts.release:major:dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$branch=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if ($branch -ne 'main') { git switch main }; git pull --rebase origin main; npm run build:pkg; npm version major; git push origin main; git push --tags; npm publish --access=restricted" && npm run start
scripts.all:main:dev: cls && npm run toscratch && npm run reinstall && npm run rebuild && npm run github && npm run dev
scripts.all:main:start: cls && npm run toscratch && npm run reinstall && npm run rebuild && npm run github && npm run start
scripts.all:main:patch: cls && npm run toscratch && npm run reinstall && npm run rebuild && npm run release:patch
scripts.all:main:minor: cls && npm run toscratch && npm run reinstall && npm run rebuild && npm run release:minor
scripts.all:main:major: cls && npm run toscratch && npm run reinstall && npm run rebuild && npm run release:major
